languages.text: "Вольный Торговец, и вы туда же! Неужели вы слепы и не видите, как ересь ксеносов проникла в самое сердце..."

traits.locale_text: "Вольный Торговец, и вы туда же! Неужели вы слепы и не видите, как ересь ксеносов проникла в самое сердце..."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Not you too, Rogue Trader! Are you all so blind that you cannot see the truth? The heresy of the xenos has seeped into the very heart—"
languages.original_text: "Вольный Торговец, и вы туда же! Неужели вы слепы и не видите, как ересь ксеносов проникла в самое сердце..."

traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

traits.locale_text: "Not you too, Rogue Trader! Are you all so blind that you cannot see the truth? The heresy of the xenos has seeped into the very heart—"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: 「自由開拓者、そのとおりです！お前たちはみな盲目過ぎる、真実が見えていない。異種族の異端はまさにこの心臓に注がれ…」
languages.original_text: "Not you too, Rogue Trader! Are you all so blind that you cannot see the truth? The heresy of the xenos has seeped into the very heart—"

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者、そのとおりです！お前たちはみな盲目過ぎる、真実が見えていない。異種族の異端はまさにこの心臓に注がれ…」
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: “连你也这么说吗，行商浪人？！难道你瞎了眼，看不到真相吗？那些异形的异端力量已经渗入了我们心中——”
languages.original_text: "Not you too, Rogue Trader! Are you all so blind that you cannot see the truth? The heresy of the xenos has seeped into the very heart—"

traits.locale_text: “连你也这么说吗，行商浪人？！难道你瞎了眼，看不到真相吗？那些异形的异端力量已经渗入了我们心中——”
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: « Vous n'allez pas vous y mettre vous aussi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Seriez-vous aveugle ? L'hérésie des xénos s'est insinuée jusque dans le cœur de... »
languages.original_text: "Not you too, Rogue Trader! Are you all so blind that you cannot see the truth? The heresy of the xenos has seeped into the very heart—"

traits.locale_text: « Vous n'allez pas vous y mettre vous aussi, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande} ! Seriez-vous aveugle ? L'hérésie des xénos s'est insinuée jusque dans le cœur de... »
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: «¡No se ponga de su parte, Comerciante Independiente! ¿Acaso están todos tan ciegos que no ven la verdad? La herejía de los xenos se ha infiltrado en el mismo corazón...».
languages.original_text: "Not you too, Rogue Trader! Are you all so blind that you cannot see the truth? The heresy of the xenos has seeped into the very heart—"

traits.locale_text: «¡No se ponga de su parte, Comerciante Independiente! ¿Acaso están todos tan ciegos que no ven la verdad? La herejía de los xenos se ha infiltrado en el mismo corazón...».
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Fangt Ihr jetzt auch schon damit an, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Seid Ihr alle so blind, dass Ihr die Wahrheit nicht sehen könnt? Die Ketzerei der Xenos ist in das Herz -"
languages.original_text: "Not you too, Rogue Trader! Are you all so blind that you cannot see the truth? The heresy of the xenos has seeped into the very heart—"

traits.locale_text: "Fangt Ihr jetzt auch schon damit an, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}! Seid Ihr alle so blind, dass Ihr die Wahrheit nicht sehen könnt? Die Ketzerei der Xenos ist in das Herz -"
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader

languages.text: "Siz de mi Hür Tacir? Hepiniz kör oldunuz da hakikati göremiyor musunuz? Zenoların kâfirliği, doğrudan yüreğinize işlemiş."
languages.original_text: "Not you too, Rogue Trader! Are you all so blind that you cannot see the truth? The heresy of the xenos has seeped into the very heart—"

traits.locale_text: "Siz de mi Hür Tacir! Hepiniz mi kör oldunuz da hakikati göremiyorsunuz? Zenoların kâfirliği, doğrudan kalbine işlemiş..."
traits.speaker: CW_NaviRadicalLeader
